title: Should Tulsa Trump sign the COVID-19 waiver?
subtitle: The Trump campaign announced a rally at the same time that public health officials recommended that people avoid large gatherings.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: The campaign for the re-election of American President Donald Trump required the audience to book tickets for June 20, 2020, and gathered in Tulsa to agree that they would not sue the campaign or the organizers of the event if they were presented to COVID-19 at the event.
